data.name: Reason_DoNotRun
data.value: File {0} cannot be loaded because you opted not to run this software now.

data.name: Reason_NeverRun
data.value: File {0} cannot be loaded because you opted never to run software from this publisher.

data.name: Reason_NotTrusted
data.value: File {0} is published by {1}. This publisher is explicitly not trusted on your system. The script will not run on the system. For more information, run the command "get-help about_signing".

data.name: Reason_RestrictedMode
data.value: File {0} cannot be loaded because running scripts is disabled on this system. For more information, see about_Execution_Policies at https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170.

data.name: Reason_Unknown
data.value: File {0} cannot be loaded. {1}.

data.name: Reason_DisallowedBySafer
data.value: File {0} cannot be loaded because its operation is blocked by software restriction policies, such as those created by using Group Policy.

data.name: Reason_FileContentUnavailable
data.value: File {0} cannot be loaded because its content could not be read.

data.name: CertNotGoodForSigning
data.value: Cannot sign code. The specified certificate is not suitable for code signing.

data.name: TimeStampUrlRequired
data.value: Cannot sign code. The TimeStamp server URL must be fully qualified, and in the format http://<server url>.

data.name: InvalidHashAlgorithm
data.value: Cannot sign code. The hash algorithm is not supported.

data.name: AuthenticodePromptCaption
data.value: Do you want to run software from this untrusted publisher?

data.name: AuthenticodePromptText
data.value: File {0} is published by {1} and is not trusted on your system. Only run scripts from trusted publishers.

data.name: AuthenticodePromptText_UnknownPublisher
data.value: Software {0} is published by an unknown publisher. It is recommended that you do not run this software.

data.name: RemoteFilePromptCaption
data.value: Security warning

data.name: RemoteFilePromptText
data.value: Run only scripts that you trust. While scripts from the internet can be useful, this script can potentially harm your computer. If you trust this script, use the Unblock-File cmdlet to allow the script to run without this warning message. Do you want to run {0}?

data.name: Choice_NeverRun
data.value: Ne&ver run

data.name: Choice_NeverRun_Help
data.value: Do not run the script from this publisher now, and do not prompt me to run this script in future. Future attempts to run this script will result in a silent failure.

data.name: Choice_DoNotRun
data.value: &Do not run

data.name: Choice_DoNotRun_Help
data.value: Do not run the script from this publisher now, and continue to prompt me to run this script in the future.

data.name: Choice_RunOnce
data.value: &Run once

data.name: Choice_RunOnce_Help
data.value: Run the script from this publisher now, and continue to prompt me to run this script in the future.

data.name: Choice_AlwaysRun
data.value: &Always run

data.name: Choice_AlwaysRun_Help
data.value: Run the script from this publisher now, and do not prompt me to run this script in the future.

data.name: Choice_Suspend
data.value: &Suspend

data.name: Choice_Suspend_Help
data.value: Pause the current pipeline and return to the command prompt. Type exit to resume operation when you are done.

data.name: MshSignature_Valid
data.value: Signature verified.

data.name: MshSignature_NotSigned
data.value: The file {0} is not digitally signed. You cannot run this script on the current system. For more information about running scripts and setting execution policy, see about_Execution_Policies at https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170

data.name: MshSignature_HashMismatch
data.value: The contents of file {0} might have been changed by an unauthorized user or process, because the hash of the file does not match the hash stored in the digital signature. The script cannot run on the specified system. For more information, run Get-Help about_Signing.

data.name: MshSignature_NotTrusted
data.value: File {0} is signed but the signer is not trusted on this system.

data.name: MshSignature_NotSupportedFileFormat
data.value: Cannot sign the file because the system does not support signing operations on {0} files.

data.name: MshSignature_NotSupportedFileFormat_NoExtension
data.value: Cannot sign the file because the system does not support signing operations on files that do not have a file name extension.

data.name: MshSignature_Incompatible
data.value: The signature cannot be verified because it is incompatible with the current system.

data.name: MshSignature_Incompatible_HashAlgorithm
data.value: The signature cannot be verified because it is incompatible with the current system. The hash algorithm is not valid.

data.name: PowerShell_CertNotGoodForSigning
data.value: Cannot sign code. The specified certificate is not suitable for code signing.

data.name: PowerShell_TimeStampUrlRequired
data.value: Cannot sign code. The TimeStamp server URL must be fully qualified in the form of http://<server url>

data.name: PowerShell_CannotRetrieveFromContainer
data.value: The Get-AuthenticodeSignature cmdlet does not support directories. Supply a path to a file and retry.

data.name: PowerShell_FileNotFound
data.value: File {0} was not found.
